name: zouzai Modern LED Bathroom Vanity Light Bar Black IP44 Over Mirror Bath Wall Fixture 5CCT Adjustable, Dual-Sided, 180° Adjustable Angle (16 inch)
short_description: ✅【5 Color Temperature Options & Wide Application】Supports 5 color temperature settings: 2700K, 3000K, 4000K, 5000K, and 6000K. Simply slide the button on the side of the box to easily select the ideal lighting to match your mood—whether it’s warm white, natural white, or cool white. This bathroom vanity light is perfect for bathrooms, mirror cabinets, restrooms, and other indoor spaces, creating a bright and clear atmosphere wherever it’s installed.

✅【Dimmable & Energy-Efficient】Suitable for 90V-135V voltage, this black LED vanity light features smooth dimming from 5% to 100%, compatible with most dimmers on the market. Premium LED beads ensure a long lifespan of up to 50,000 hours. When you don’t need full brightness, turning down the light helps save more energy, providing both energy efficiency and eco-friendly lighting.

✅【Adjustable Angle & Dual-Sided Illumination】The unique 180-degree adjustable angle design allows you to easily adjust the light up and down to meet various lighting needs. The dual-sided lighting design is brighter than common single-sided lights on the market, offering wider and more even illumination for your space.

✅【Easy Installation】 Directly connect to the reserved wiring, suitable for US standard junction boxes. The accessory pack includes quick wiring terminals, making the installation process simple and time-saving.

✅【High Quality & Waterproof Design】 Made of high-quality metal back panel and pure white frosted acrylic, with IP44 waterproof and dustproof capacity, making it perfect for use in humid environments. The power driver is ETL certified, ensuring safety and durability for long-lasting performance.
